title: Viking Inspired - Medieval Fantasy Music Combo Pack
description: Viking Inspired - Medieval Fantasy Music Combo Pack
longDescription:
Viking Inspired & Medieval Fantasy Music Combo Pack

Contains two complete music packs - 44 total wave files, over 70 minutes of music!


First music pack is Medieval Fantasy Music. Details below.

Medieval Fantasy Music Pack

Spotify

Youtube


10 original Medieval Fantasy inspired scores, plus 10 associated loop tracks for each. Also included 2 extended pad / drone tracks.


22 total WAV files, over 35 minutes of original music (not counting the loops and pads)


01. Tides of Menai Strait    - 03:41

02. Tides of Menai Strait (Loop) - 00:43

03. Fetch My Halberd       - 03:54

04. Fetch My Halberd (Loop)   - 00:28

05. Knights of the Keep     - 03:52

06. Knights of the Keep (Loop)  - 00:26

07. Dalriada Devastation     - 03:59

08. Darriada Devastation (Loop) - 00:15

09. Meet Me at the Tavern    - 03:00

10. Meet Me at the Tavern (Loop) - 00:43

11. Mud in the Marsh       - 03:24

12. Mud in the Marsh (Loop)   - 00:21

13. Raise the Banner       - 03:58

14. Raise the Banner (Loop)   - 00:19

15. The Bruce          - 03:50

16. The Bruce (Loop)       - 00:51

17. Voyage Home         - 03:26

18. Voyage Home (Loop)      - 00:42

19. East of West Anglia     - 02:50

20. East of West Anglia (Loop)  - 00:27

21. PAD01            - 03:44

22. PAD02            - 03:56

technicalDetails:

  • 10 Viking Inspired original scores plus 10 loops and 2 pads
